meanings.definition: A graphical user interface element used to display a list of items that can be selected by the user.
meanings.sent1: The listboxes on the screen showed different options for the user to choose from.
meanings.sent2: I clicked on one of the listboxes to select my preferred item.
meanings.sent3: The listboxes at the bottom of the page were having a party, each hoping to be picked by the user.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a set of listboxes, each option neatly displayed for her to consider.
meanings.sent5: The listboxes glowed on the interface, beckoning the user to make a selection.

meanings.definition: A collection of listboxes on a form or webpage for organizing and presenting information.
meanings.sent1: The webpage had multiple listboxes arranged neatly for easy access to information.
meanings.sent2: She scrolled through the listboxes to find the specific data she needed.
meanings.sent3: The listboxes on the form seemed to be gossiping about the data they held.
meanings.sent4: The listboxes on the webpage were like little treasure chests waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The listboxes on the screen danced in harmony, showcasing the organized information.
